document_data.mainbody:
uardian staves were magic staves that possessed offensive and defensive enchantments, in use in the late 15 century DR.
Guardian staves were ancient weapons with souls of once-great warriors bound to them. They possessed +1 and +2 enchantments that guided the wielders hands towards the targets and made attacks more deadly and, at the same time, granted magical protection to the wielder. They also slightly increased their spell damage and fortified their will and physique.
Several of the guardian staves found use in the city of Neverwinter and the nearby Crags in the late 15 century DR.
